price: Yoo (haqa irraa) garagalaniif, dhugumatti wanti sirra jiru (ergaa) qaqqabsiisuu ifa ta’e qofa.
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-innamā ʿalayka al-balāghu al-mubīnu
